title.rendered: TTE becomes the official distributor of Bostik HVAC solutions in the UAE

content.rendered:
TTE hosted Arkema and Bostik C&C Team at the head office. Roland Albers, Betrand Jausseme, Andrew Geeves, Koen Samwel, Redha Salaouatchi, Simon Veal, Shibin Basheer and Susanne Barthalomeusz, were warmly welcomed by Roshan Samuel, Associate Vice President, Products & Solutions, Nikhil Mohan, Assistant Manager- Business Development, Kanchan Koppikar, Head-Marketing & Communications, ECIG and the Products & Solutions Team. The partnership and the first PO were signed between Dilip Sharma, ECIG Executive VP, and Roland Albers, Senior Vice President, Arkema.

Bostik, part of Arkema, is a leading global adhesive specialist in construction, consumer and industrial markets. For over a century, they have been developing innovative sealing and bonding solutions that are smarter and more adaptive. With this partnership, TTE becomes the official distributor for Bostik Idenden (HVAC) solutions in the UAE.
